activity.title: openfoodfacts/openfoodfacts-explorer#410
activity.text:
> Regardless of whether we want this change or not, I would expect an update in the readme which explains how to turn on and off development mode. And an update to the env example file.

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7266cece-4c65-4997-8cd0-5a788c5ced2c)
As you can see here the development mode for the debug options is not taken from .env rather from '$app/environment', so whenever you run it locally automatically the development mode is turned on .
In the same way debug options are hid in the other places :
For example:
In knowledge panels :
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/33850ab7-68db-4981-82a1-b7e9812821e3)

open_prs.title: fix: Hide debug option for questions in product page(Prodution)
feat: Add support for Price editing
feat: Add button to each product to open Hunger Games
